name: Kickboard - Soccer Pinball
description:
Kickboard - Soccer Pinball is your new favorite flipper game. This free spinball and Free PinBall Game will offer you fun and fantasy . The HD arcades will allow you to get better thanks to the different games.

This easy to play game keeps you hooked on when you try to keep the ball within the gameplay zone. If that wasn't tough enough, you have to collect the red ball
Try our new and amazing Kickboard - Soccer Pinball by tapping the launcher to fire the ball and get ready to be reactive !

You need sniper reflexes to keep the game going on..
This is a simple touch game which you can play between those boring meetings, and on those bus travels.
Compete with players all over the world to reach the top score.

How to Play the Game:
- Use left and right tap to move the levers
- Make sure the pinball does not fall down
- Collect and crush the red ball
- Reach as much score as possible

This pinball game is a great entertainment, download it to love it !
